lead_paragraph: ZEIGERMAN--David, It is with a profound sense of loss and sorrow that we note the passing of David Zeigerman on June 17th in Edgewater, NJ. David was a devoted husband to Mindy Gale, a loving father to Arianne and Zara, and a beloved brother to Ziggy. Born in Vienna, his family then moved to Malmo, Sweden, where he grew up and began his creative career. David was an award-winning art director, artist and entrepreneur. His passion for the arts was exceeded only by his lifelong desire to mentor the talents of young artists. A tireless champion for the State of Israel, he was also an advocate of Holocaust awareness and education. In addition to his immediate family, he leaves behind a host of family and friends who will cherish his memory, legacy and indomitable spirit forever. Funeral services will be held at 11am on Tuesday, June 21st at Temple Emanu-El in Cloister, NJ. 1/3
